entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 02 January 2023
